navigableData.title: Hello World
navigableData.about: My name is Nick Malozzi, and I ❤️ building interfaces. As a Front End Developer with experience in Graphic, Web, & UX Design, I'm uniquely suited to work closely with Design and/or Product Teams. I'm not currently seeking new opportunities, but don't hesitate to get in touch.

projects.title: Instructor Dashboard
projects.description: Built the Instructor Interface for the Bluprint Video Player Library. This included a statistics section, and an interactive commenting inbox.

projects.title: Video Player Library (VPL)
projects.description: Was a core contributor to the Bluprint Video Player Library. My work included consuming and interfacing with our video player (TheoPlayer), styling the video player controls, and passing watch/play data to and from our analytics platforms.

projects.title: Video Player Experience (VPE)
projects.description: Built the Blupint Video Player Experience. Which included the consumption of the VPL mentioned above, as well as the entire user interface for Bluprint's core product. The VPE included episodic navigation, supplies and materials downloads, timestamped notes/bookmarks, and commenting. Additionally, I built user state based messaging/marketing and analytics.

projects.title: Craftsy/Bluprint React Native App
projects.description: Was a core Front End contributor to the ground-up rebuild of the Craftsy iOS/Android App using React Native.

projects.title: Craftsy/Bluprint Shop 2.0
projects.description: Was a core contributor to the ground-up rebuild of Craftsy. Which later became the Bluprint Shop. Initial responsibilities included designing and building the Atomic Component Library, and the SASS architecture. Said architecture supported 2 major rebranding efforts on tight timelines (that I executed). Later responsibilities included a number of new features.

projects.title: Craftsy 1.0
projects.description: Was a core contributor to the Craftsy 1.0 Platform. Responsibilities included UX/UI design, and HTML/JS.

projects.title: nickmalozzi.com
projects.description: This very portfolio site is designed, built, and maintained solely by yours truly.

projects.title: Old Heads That Shred
projects.description: COMING SOON: Old Heads That Shred is a joint effort with a friend of mine. I'm currently building the site to support our skateboard brand that caters to skaters who firmly believe that age is just a number.

jobs.name: TN Marketing
jobs.description: Building and launching new features/sites for the TN Marketing portfolio of enthusiast websites. These sites leverage Wordpress, WooCommerce, React, SASS/SCSS, and JS/jQuery. In addition to Development responsibilities mentioned, also responsible for working closely with the UX team to maintain and build TN's Style Library.

jobs.name: Bluprint
jobs.description: Contributed to multiple Front End stacks. Included, but not limited to, an e-commerce platform built in React, an iPhone/Android app built in React Native, a Video Player Library built in Preact/React/JS, and a CMS built in Handlebars/JS. Participated in a number of rebranding and/or rebuilding efforts.

jobs.name: Craftsy
jobs.jobTitle: Sr UX Engineer & Front End UI Engineer
jobs.description: Came on board with Craftsy as a UX Engineer; was quickly promoted to Sr UX Engineer. UX Engineer responsibilities included working with the Product team to create wire frames, user tests, mock ups, conduct user tests, and write HTML/CSS for new features. Transistioned to a more Development focused role in January of 2017.

jobs.name: Echostar
jobs.description: Was the primary UI/UX Designer for dishanywhere.com, Dish Network's streaming service. Also contributed to the Front End coding efforts needed to launch the site.

jobs.name: On-Site.com
jobs.description: Designed and coded a template system for the On-Site Marketing platform for apartment complexes. As well as redesigned the UI/UX for said platform's administration interface.

jobs.name: Resort Destination Marketing
jobs.description: Designed and coded vacation rental website's for the ski industry.

jobs.name: Sposto Interactive
jobs.description: Web Design Internship setup through my college.

schools.name: Kutztown University
schools.description: Concentrations in Interactive(Web) & Graphic Design. President of the Outdoors Club.

schools.name: Liberty High School
schools.description: Graduated with honors. President of FBLA, President of the Ski Club, Assistant Captain of the Ice Hockey Team.
